tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE satellite_trajectory_patterns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_id INT,
    trajectory_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    trajectory_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE trajectory_data ( 
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  satellite_id INT, 
  time_of_pass TIMESTAMP, 
  location_lat DOUBLE PRECISION, 
  location_long DOUBLE PRECISION, 
  velocity DOUBLE PRECISION 
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_trajectory (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite_name VARCHAR(50),
  trajectory_type VARCHAR(50),
  launch_date TIMESTAMP,
  velocity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE trajectory_data (
  data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_info (
  satellite_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite_name VARCHAR(50),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
  launch_country VARCHAR(50),
  launch_vehicle VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Satellite (
    satellite_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_name VARCHAR(50),
    launch_date DATE,
    orbit_type VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Trajectory (
    trajectory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_id INT,
    trajectory_date DATE,
    trajectory_path VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (satellite_id) REFERENCES Satellite(satellite_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Observation (
    observation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trajectory_id INT,
    observation_date DATE,
    observation_data VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (trajectory_id) REFERENCES Trajectory(trajectory_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    observation_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_result VARCHAR(1000),
    FOREIGN KEY (observation_id) REFERENCES Observation(observation_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Satellite (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR,
 launch_date DATE,
 orbit_type VARCHAR,
 satellite_type VARCHAR,
 status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE Trajectory (trajectory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 satellite_id INT,
 trajectory_date DATE,
 trajectory_time TIME,
 trajectory_location VARCHAR,
 CONSTRAINT fk_satellite_id FOREIGN KEY (satellite_id) REFERENCES Satellite(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Mission (mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 mission_name VARCHAR,
 satellite_id INT,
 launch_date DATE,
 status VARCHAR,
 CONSTRAINT fk_satellite_id FOREIGN KEY (satellite_id) REFERENCES Satellite(id)
);
